ISSUE.TITLE: Order search default [ALL] in multi selected missing
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Orders >Filters search area ( by default ALL in multi selected missing ) 2. Select any thing from payment statuses filter ex: default display nothing , select Pending ( searching properly) 3. Remove that filter now in the text box default selected ALL is coming https://prnt.sc/22b90b1 https://www.loom.com/share/f3f690fce7a54c4d81947b877175479b
